module.create_neobots.charging.tooltip.d: Orders the bot to connect to charging pad it's _standing on_ and charge its battery. Will charge till it reach 95% capacity.
module.create_neobots.move_to.tooltip.de: Orders to the bot to move to the selected position.
module.create_neobots.move_to.tooltip.no: • Target: Right Click on a block
module.create_neobots.deposit.tooltip.de: Orders to the bot to take matching items from _its inventory_ and store them in _the container_.
module.create_neobots.deposit.tooltip.no: • To: Right Click on a Container
module.create_neobots.deposit.tooltip.sk: • Skip if no item is possible to be delivered
module.create_neobots.withdraw.tooltip.d: Orders to the bot to take matching items from _the container_ and store them in _its inventory_.
module.create_neobots.withdraw.tooltip.n: • From: Right Click on a Container
module.create_neobots.withdraw.tooltip.s: • Skip if no item is possible to be delivered
crash.create_neobots.not_on_charger: Bot was not standing on the charging pad.
create_neobots.ponder.tag.bots.descripti: All available bot assemblies. More will be added in future versions.
create_neobots.ponder.bot_assembly.text_: Assembling a bot is the same as an Iron Golem. Place the parts as shown!
The head is the core block. By placing the head, you will have your bot.
Note that the bots will turn off as spawned due lack of energy.
Give them a charged battery and they will start their tasks.
create_neobots.ponder.charging.text_1: Charging pad is a kinetic block powered from below.
create_neobots.ponder.charging.text_2: The charger on to of the pad will be able to charge batteries
create_neobots.ponder.charging.text_3: Batteries can be inserted using funnels or just right clicking on it.
create_neobots.ponder.charging.text_4: The charging pad can also charge bots directly above it.
create_neobots.ponder.charging.text_5: Though the bot needs to connect to the pad using a charging module.
create_neobots.ponder.charging.text_6: And the pad can only charge one bot at a time... more might result in a bot crash.
